name: ghost
description:
as the faerie queen slept
a soft fluttering outside her window 
roused her from her dreams.

it was a ghost 
one which had haunted her shadows
since she was a young faerie.

he was gentle & shy
appearing as flash 
of blue & silver light.

not wanting to cause him to flee
in formless fright 
she kept her eyes closed & rolled over
letting him gaze upon that 
which he, without a body, 
could neither touch nor taste.

back into her dreams she sunk 
dipping deeper into his blues
mingling with his spirit form.

alive inside her heart & soul 
the ghost had found his home 
no longer cursed to roam.

________________________________
